message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good starting point for negotiation.
Your offer was a bit too one-sided, Alice. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split the difference from last round and go with 45/55 in your favor. It's still a fair deal considering inflation.
